generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, extending into the distance and occupied by vehicles and pedestrians.
- sidewalk: The right side of the image shows a paved area with parked bicycles, separated from the road by a curb, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection, indicating stop signals.
- traffic sign: A triangular "yield" sign is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background along the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible crossing the road with a wheeled suitcase.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a black car parked on the right side of the street.
- truck: A green crane truck is visible on the left side of the street.
- bus: A red bus is visible in the distance, stopped at a bus stop.
- bicycle: Multiple bicycles are parked on the right side of the street.
